item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Home is the place where, when you have to go there, They have to take you in." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Mary Tallmountain
item.description: "light bright shining" -- Mary Tallmountain

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Deborah Harkness
item.description: "Se Souvenir du passe, et qu'il ya un avenir: Remember the past, and that there is a future." -- Deborah Harkness

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Dana Stabenow
item.description: "Once in a while, I like to polish my halo by taking on a case pro bono." -- Dana Stabenow

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "He found his mother and Carolee on two in the Eve and Roarke room." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Elbert G. Hubbard
item.description: "the best service a book can render you is, not to impart truth, but to make you think it out for yourself." -- Elbert G. Hubbard

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "A house without books is like a room without windows." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description:
"Draco Dormiens Nunquam Titillandus
[<i>never tickle a sleeping dragon</i>]" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "I saw you standing on a veranda you'd built with your own hands. And I loved you." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by P.C. Cast Kristin Cast
item.description: "If you have good friends, no matter how much life is sucking , they can make you laugh." -- P.C. Cast Kristin Cast

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "This must be the legendary Yankee rudeness" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "He decided there was no point in telling her he'd looked in the fridge and seen none of these things. There'd just be some variation of his mother's standard crack about Male Refrigeration Blindness Syndrome." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Terri Guillemets
item.description: "If I fall asleep with a pen in my hands, don't remove it - I might be writing in my dreams." -- Terri Guillemets

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Time with a friend was as refreshing as a nap." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Julia Spencer-Fleming
item.description: "What has been seen cannot be unseen" -- Julia Spencer-Fleming

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Try to imagine a life without timekeeping. You probably can’t. You know the month, the year, the day of the week. There is a clock on your wall or the dashboard of your car. You have a schedule, a calendar, a time for dinner or a movie. Yet all around you, timekeeping is ignored. Birds are not late. A dog does not check its watch. Deer do not fret over passing birthdays. an alone measures time. Man alone chimes the hour. And, because of this, man alone suffers a paralyzing fear that no other creature endures. A fear of time running out." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Henry Ward Beecher
item.description: "Books are not made for furniture, but there is nothing else that so beautifully furnishes a house." -- Henry Ward Beecher

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Kathy Reichs
item.description: "I try to be open-minded, to judge each individual on merit and accomplishment. I hold no bias against any belief system, sexual orientation, or skin color that differs from mine. I do not hate in stereotype." -- Kathy Reichs

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "What is history but a fable agreed upon?" -- Napoleon Bonaparte

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Elizabeth Lowell
item.description: "Do flies trapped in amber scream?" -- Elizabeth Lowell
